Description: Pottery ostracon, with one incised line of Coptic on exterior, from the rim of a vessel, inside rim black band with four white circles, on interior of body white band and white outline of circle.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394051) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394051)
